attributes.action: TO GET FREEMASONS IN POSITIONS OF POWER COURTS P0LICE. COUNCIL .ECT.... TO REGISTER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for registration of freemasons after all they are in official positions over ordinary  PEOPLE LIKE THE VOTERS ECT ... THANK YOU

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
